org.ambraproject.rhino.service.impl

Class ArticleCrudServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.service.impl.AmbraService
      • org.ambraproject.rhino.service.impl.ArticleCrudServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArticleCrudService, DoiBasedCrudService

    public class ArticleCrudServiceImpl
extends AmbraService
implements ArticleCrudService
    Service implementing _c_reate, _r_ead, _u_pdate, and _d_elete operations on article entities and files.

      • write

        public org.ambraproject.models.Article write(InputStream file,
                                    com.google.common.base.Optional<ArticleIdentity> suppliedId,
                                    DoiBasedCrudService.WriteMode mode)
                                      throws IOException,
                                             org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException
        Create or update an article from supplied XML data. If no article exists with the given identity, a new article entity is created; else, the article is re-ingested and the new data replaces the old data in the file store.

        The input stream is closed after being successfully read, but this is not guaranteed. Any invocation of this method must be enclosed in a try block, with the argument input stream closed in the finally block.

        Specified by:
        write in interface ArticleCrudService
        Parameters:
        file - the XML data for the article
        suppliedId - the identifier supplied for the article, if any
        Returns:
        the created or update Article
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException

        Determines if we should save a file contained within an article archive as an asset.
        Parameters:

        articleXmlFilename - the file name for the article XML, as given by the manifest (must be lowercase)
        Returns:

      • listRecent

        public Transceiver listRecent(String journalKey,
                     Calendar threshold,
                     com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> minimum,
                     List<String> articleTypes)
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ArticleCrudService
        List the DOIs, titles, and publication dates of all articles published after a certain threshold. If a minimum result count is provided, go past the threshold to return that many if necessary.

        If a list of article types is provided, return all articles of those types published after the threshold, ordered by that type. (That is, type order takes precedence over chronological order.) If a minimum result count is provided and the date-threshold results are below it, instead provide all articles of those type(s) up to the minimum, in chronological order.

        The string "*" may be used as a stand-in that matches all article types. For example, place it at the end of the list to get all articles past the threshold if there aren't enough of the preceding types. If minimum is present and articleTypes contains more than 1 element, then articleTypes must contain "*".

        Specified by:
        listRecent in interface ArticleCrudService
        Parameters:
        journalKey - journal to search
        threshold - return all articles published after this date
        minimum - minimum result count
        articleTypes - the list of article types to filter, in order of preference; may be null
        Throws:
        IOException
